practice_phrases: they didn't say
他们没有说
they didn't say yes
他们没有说是的
we didn't say that
我们没有说那个
they didn't say they were happy
他们没有说他们很高兴
they didn't say they can help
他们没有说他们能帮忙
we didn't say we were almost ready
我们没有说我们差不多准备好了
they didn't say they will be able to do that

we didn't say we thought it could be done more efficiently after the meal

They didn't say what they wanted to do.
他们没有说他们想做什么。

seed_context.known: 他们没有说他们想做什么。
seed_context.target: They didn't say what they wanted to do.
